sentences.en: "I know of a well in Utah that lost its original capacity after a couple years, " he said.
sentences.cn: “我知道在犹他州在短短的几年时间里，一口井就失去了最初的容量，”他说。

sentences.en: A government "sanitation" team uses heavy equipment, including bulldozers and cranes, to remove all traces of the A-12 spy plane from a 1963 crash site in the Utah desert.
sentences.cn: 一个政府“清理”团队使用推土机和起重机等重型设备从1963年A-12间谍飞机在美国犹他州沙漠的失事地点抹去所有痕迹。

sentences.en: A Utah prairie dog emerges to forage in spring snow.
sentences.cn: 犹他州的一只草原土拨鼠顶着春雪出来觅食.

sentences.en: And he thinks Utah is close to finding one.
sentences.cn: 他认为犹他州将很快找到可行的办法.

sentences.en: Corrugated , crenulated, they course up, down, and across Utah.
sentences.cn: 缩成皱纹的,小园齿状的, 它们的航线上, 下, 和穿过犹他州.

sentences.en: Gasol will not play tonight against Utah or Friday against Seattle.
sentences.cn: 今晚对犹他州或周五对西雅图加索尔将不会出战.

sentences.en: He set up a new world record in September, 1935 at Bonneville Salt Flats, Utah.
sentences.cn: 他于1935年9月在犹他州的博纳维尔的索尔特·弗拉兹创造了世界记录.

sentences.en: I even moved to Utah to be with him.
sentences.cn: 我甚至搬到了犹他州，为了和他在一起。

sentences.en: In Utah, discovering a band of polygamists hardly raises an eyebrow.
sentences.cn: 在犹他州发现一伙重婚者不足为奇.

sentences.en: Much of Texas, New Mexico, Arizona, Nevada and Utah is desert.
sentences.cn: 新墨西哥州 、 阿里佐纳州 、 内华达州、犹他州和德克萨斯的大部分地区为沙漠.

sentences.en: Oh yes , and the New Orleans Jazz became the Utah Jazz.
sentences.cn: 而当时的新奥尔良爵士队就是后来的犹他爵士.

sentences.en: Ron Artest converted every person from Utah into Rockets fans.
sentences.cn: 阿泰把所有犹他州的人变成火箭迷.

sentences.en: The Bad: Think of this as the bizarro Utah game.
sentences.cn: 缺点: 把这当作是和爵士队的比赛吧.

sentences.en: The largest university __ Salt Lake City is the University of Utah.
sentences.cn: 盐湖城最大的大学是犹他州立大学.

sentences.en: Utah Jazz: Do they need to start packing their pillows, or what?
sentences.cn: 尤他爵士: 他们需要准备枕头, 还是其他什么?

sentences.en: Utah shot 38 % overall and went four for 19 on three - pointers.
sentences.cn: 爵士的命中率只有38%,三分球命中率更是可怜的19%.

sentences.en: With the air reinforcement, Utah was a swift smooth landing.
sentences.cn: 在空军的支援下, 犹他海滩是一次快速、平稳的登陆.

sentences.en: You think all girls from Utah are mormons?
sentences.cn: 你觉得犹他的女孩都是摩门教的?

phrases.tran_cn: 犹他爵士队（美国篮球队）
